channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Crossing the Uncanny Valley: Breakthrough in technology for lifelike facial expressions in androids
item.description: Even highly realistic androids can cause unease when their facial expressions lack emotional consistency. Traditionally, a 'patchwork method' has been...

item.title: Can the heart heal itself? New study says it can

item.title: NSF Graduate Research Fellows: Saving tigers, studying cancer and keeping park visitors safe at night

item.title: Electronic components can self-assemble using new technique

item.title: Mysteries of icy ocean worlds

item.title: Twisted Edison: Bright, elliptically polarized incandescent light

item.title: Virus that threatened humanity opens the future
item.description: Scientists have developed an innovative therapeutic platform by mimicking the intricate structures of viruses using artificial intelligence (AI).

item.title: New development of 'impossible' polymer capable of increasing both stiffness and flexibility
